sn17.3:1.3: Bhutapubbam, bhikkhave, annatarasmim udakarahade mahakummakulam ciranivasi ahosi.
sn17.3:1.4: Atha kho, bhikkhave, annataro kummo annataram kummam etadavoca:
sn17.3:1.5: ‘ma kho tvam, tata kumma, etam padesam agamasi’ti.
sn17.3:1.6: Agamasi kho, bhikkhave, so kummo tam padesam.
sn17.3:1.8: Atha kho, bhikkhave, so kummo yena so kummo tenupasankami.
sn17.3:1.9: Addasa kho, bhikkhave, so kummo tam kummam duratova agacchantam.
sn17.3:1.11: ‘kacci tvam, tata kumma, na tam padesam agamasi’ti?
sn17.3:1.14: ‘Akkhato khomhi, tata kumma, anupahato, atthi ca me idam suttakam pitthito pitthito anubandhan’ti.
sn17.3:1.16: Etena hi te, tata kumma, suttakena pitaro ca pitamaha ca anayam apanna byasanam apanna.
sn17.3:1.17: Gaccha dani tvam, tata kumma, na dani tvam amhakan’ti.
sn17.3:2.1: Luddoti kho, bhikkhave, marassetam papimato adhivacanam.
sn17.3:2.4: Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannam labhasakkarasilokam assadeti nikameti—
sn17.3:2.5: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu giddho papataya anayam apanno byasanam apanno yathakamakaraniyo papimato.
